topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fe4f09636872452c650100#post_53fe4f09636872452c650100
The influx of russian equipment and manpower might tip the scales a bit, though. 

Of course, the grunts may not be too fanatically devoted to their cause.  IIRC, one of the captured paratroopers even said they were told that they were participating in an exercise, but were taken to ukraine instead. So their morale might not exactly be through the roof, if you catch my meaning.

We'll see.
